title: Helldivers 2 Makes a Big Mistake - Kinda Funny Games Daily 05.03.24
description:
Go to http://auraframes.com and use code KINDAFUNNY to get $30-off plus free shipping on their best-selling frame.

Greg and Tim talk about some Helldivers 2 controversy (forcing PSN accounts) and rumors about the next Resident Evil.

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:03:22 - Housekeeping
 - Today after, KFGD:
      - Gamescast is the Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth Spoilercast
      - After Gamescast is the Game Showdown Season 2 Premiere
      - Join Nick and the PokeCrew TODAY for another fun-filled Marathon stream as they battle their way to The Elite Four. Will they call Kris Anka so many times he blocks their number? Come find out at 1pm after Game Showdown only on twitch.tv/KindaFunnyGames
            -  The Roper Report   -
00:05:38 - Helldivers 2 PC players will be forced to link to a PSN account later this month
00:20:51 - Resident Evil 9 could be released in January, it’s claimed
00:30:16 - Nintendo World Championships: NES Edition for Switch has been rated by the ESRB
00:35:03 - Nintendo takes down more than 8,500 clones of Switch emulator Yuzu with a single DMCA notice
00:40:49 - Wee News!
00:42:13 - SuperChats
00:50:39 - You‘re Wrong
Monday’s Hosts: Greg & Roger
